price: 12. (Buvo tarta jo sūnui): „Jahja (Jonai), tvirtai laikykis Rašto [Taurato (Toros)].“ Ir Mes suteikėme jam išmintį, kol jis vis dar buvo vaikas.
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
